T02D2125:171b-1: shr'i ae ka dza t'i bha ga w'a na s'a dha na /
T02D2125:171b-3: dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2125:171b-4: bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2125:171b-5: dngos gsum bdag nyid rnam gsum po //
T02D2125:171b-6: de dag dngos med dngos bral ba //
T02D2125:171b-9: de zhal de yi bka' drin gyis //
T02D2125:171b-10: mthong thos byin gyis brlabs pa'i rgyus //
T02D2125:171b-11: rgya mtsho che las mar bzhin du //
T02D2125:171b-12: dad ldan rnams la bsdus te bstan//
T02D2125:171b-13: de la re zhig sngags pas phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas su 'dug ste /
T02D2125:171b-14: ji skad 'byung ba'i legs par spyad pa rnams kyis lus dang ngag dang yid bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2125:171b-15: de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar
T02D2125:171b-16: byas la lus dang sems rab tu sbyangs pa las
T02D2125:171b-17: rang gis 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum
T02D2125:171b-18: bsgom pa ni / sna tshogs padma mdzes pa'i dbus //
T02D2125:171b-19: mtshan ldan ka p'a la yi nang //
T02D2125:171b-20: rol ba'i bdud rtsis rab gang la //
T02D2125:171b-21: mi ro yis ni khab rgyan pa'o //
T02D2125:171b-22: de steng gri gug thod pa dag / shes rab rabs kyi bdag nyid bsam //
T02D2125:171b-23: sangs rgyas la sogs mchod tshogs dang //
T02D2125:171b-24: ma lus 'gro ba'i don bsgrubs pa'o //
T02D2125:171b-26: chos kun ro gcig ye shes dngos //
T02D2125:171b-27: ye shes snying po h'um yig bsam //
T02D2125:171b-28: de bzhin de las rdo rjer gyur //
T02D2125:171b-29: de bzhin de gyur dpal chen po //
T02D2125:171b-30: bcom ldan ral pa gcig mchog bsgrub //
T02D2125:171b-31: dmar mo gzhon nu sgeg mo dpal //
T02D2125:171b-32: ral gcig ma ni mdun du'o //
T02D2125:171b-33: nam mkha'i mdog can zhi zhing khro //
T02D2125:171b-34: sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par spud //
T02D2125:171b-35: gri gug thod khrag phyag gnyis kyis //
T02D2125:171b-37: ral gri autpal g-yas dang g-yon //
T02D2125:171b-38: rnam bzhi yum yang de bzhin no //
T02D2125:171b-39: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum lha mo dang //
T02D2125:171b-40: dbang phyug 'jigs pa mnan par blta //
T02D2125:171b-41: de yi thugs kar pad dbus su //
T02D2125:171b-42: rang rig rgyal po h'um yig go //
T02D2125:171b-43: snying po gsang ba'i sngags 'bru bzhi //
T02D2125:171b-44: zla ba skar ma'i phreng ba bzhin//
T02D2125:172a-1: de nas tshad med rnam bzhi yi //
T02D2125:172a-2: mi zad yid kyi rlung bskyod pas //
T02D2125:172a-4: don gnyis don gsum bsgrubs ns ni //
T02D2125:172a-5: bzlas pa'i 'khor lo lo 'khor lo bzhin //
T02D2125:172a-6: sa gsum yi ge gsum gyi 'od //
T02D2125:172a-7: sa gsum 'khor lo gsum dngos te //
T02D2125:172a-8: dngos gsum dag pa gsum du 'dod //
T02D2125:172a-9: bde gsal rnam par mi rtog dang //
T02D2125:172a-10: gdod nas de bzhin nyid rdzogs bsgom //
T02D2125:172a-11: de nas gtor ma sbyi pa ni //
T02D2125:172a-12: cho ga sems bskyed sngon btang nas //
T02D2125:172a-13: rang nyid lha myur bskyed nas ni //
T02D2125:172a-14: cho ga rnam gsum phyag rgyar bcas //
T02D2125:172a-15: dpa' chen rang nyid lhar dran las //
T02D2125:172a-16: mchod rdzas bdud rtsi mchog gyur pas //
T02D2125:172a-17: bsam byas snying gi 'od zer gyis //
T02D2125:172a-18: dgug pa'i 'gron rnams tshim par bya //
T02D2125:172a-19: aom a'a:h'um hr'im trim h'um byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2125:172a-20: aom a'a:ratna gu ru shr'i bha ga w'a na ae
T02D2125:172a-21: ka dzat 'i sarba aashta de ba t'a sarbarma ba
T02D2125:172a-22: lilm ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D2125:172a-23: ma ma raksha raksha h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D2125:172a-25: ma lus lha sku gsang sngags dang //
T02D2125:172a-26: ting 'dzin gang zhig gang gis ni //
T02D2125:172a-27: gang du ji ltar bsgom pa nyid //
T02D2125:172a-28: kun rdzob don dam mtshan nyid kyis //
T02D2125:172a-29: rmi lam nam mkha' dpe yis ni //
T02D2125:172a-30: mkhas pas chos rnam rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2125:172a-31: blo sgra dpe zhes bya ba yis //
T02D2125:172a-32: bsam brjod mtshon par mi nus pa //
T02D2125:172a-33: so so rang rig 'od gsal yul //
T02D2125:172a-34: gang de nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2125:172a-35: ji srid sna tshogs sku gsung thugs //
T02D2125:172a-36: 'di dag snang ba rang snang ba //
T02D2125:172a-37: bden brdzun gnyis dang gnyis min tshul //
T02D2125:172a-38: rmi lam gyi ni grong sogs bzhin //
T02D2125:172a-39: dpal ldan shar phyogs rig 'byung gnas //
T02D2125:172a-40: ga au ra yi bram ze'i grong //
T02D2125:172a-41: mnyam med tshangs dbang gtsub lag tu //
T02D2125:172a-42: grogs po'i ming don ldan bskul nas //
T02D2125:172a-44: dge bas rdo rje 'dzin thob shog / rgya gar
T02D2125:172a-45: gyi slob dpon chen po shr'i badzra k'i rti'i zhal
